item.title: Rural Youth from Jogulamba Gadwal Win State-Level Second Prize for Road Safety Short Film
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a proud moment for Jogulamba Gadwal district, a group of talented rural youths secured the State-Level Second Prize in the short film competition held as part of Police Martyrs’ Day on October 21, 2025.
The award-winning short film highlights the dangers of reckless riding—particularly triple riding without helmets—and emphasizes the life-saving importance of obeying traffic rules. With the powerful message,
“Not recommendations… Road safety rules are what save your life,”
the film...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh, Live Updates, Big Story, Sunday Hans, Andhra Pradesh

item.title: Senior Citizens’ Week Celebrated with Special Events in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Special programs were organized for senior citizens on Saturday under the auspices of the Women, Child, and Senior Citizens Welfare Department at the premises of the Gadwal Retired Employees’ Office. As part of the celebrations, engaging activities such as carroms, chess, and singing competitions were conducted to encourage and entertain senior citizens, who expressed great joy and enthusiasm while participating.
District Child Welfare Officer Sunanda stated that the event was aimed at ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh, Live Updates, Big Story, Sunday Hans, Andhra Pradesh
